short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly save and access your favorite Sign Ups from SignUpGenius

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A tool to help you quickly save every important Sign Up for easy access.

FUNCTIONALITY
- Save Sign Ups
- Access saved Sign Ups
- Delete Sign Ups

PROCESS
1. Navigate to a Sign Up directly or find one by clicking on the [Search for Sign Ups] button.
2. Click on the SignUpSaver Chrome extension.
3. Click on the green [Save Sign Up] button.
4. The Sign Up will automagically save and can be quickly accessed from the SignUpSaver list.
5. Click on the red [X] to permanently delete a Sign Up.

NERD NOTES
- This tool will only help you save Sign Ups created on SignUpGenius.com.
- The Sign Ups are saved as bookmarks in a folder titled "SignUpSaver", which is located inside the "Other Bookmarks" folder.
- The SignUpSaver bulb icon will shift from grayscale to a colorized version when viewing a valid Sign Up page on SignUpGenius.com.

DISCLAIMER
This is Chrome extension was developed independently from SignUpGenius.com and is not affiliated in any way.
